Denise polish's childhood in Brussels
was torn apart by the second world war
in 1942 as Nazi Germany strengthened his
grip on Europe her family were forced
into a series of internment camps with
other Jewish families just before her
parents were sent to Auschwitz
Denise was smuggled out of a camp by the
French Resistance she was only four
years old a French woman looked after
Denise for the next seven years giving
her an assumed identity Denise had no
